actions.text: Referred to House Committee on International Relations.

official_title: Concurrent resolution expressing the sense of the Congress that the Holy Crown of Saint Stephen should remain in the safekeeping of the U.S. Government until Hungary once again functions as a constitutional government established by the Hungarian people through free choice.

summary.text: Declares it the sense of Congress that the Holy Crown of Saint Stephen should remain in the United States until a constitutional government is established in Hungary.

titles.title: Concurrent resolution expressing the sense of the Congress that the Holy Crown of Saint Stephen should remain in the safekeeping of the U.S. Government until Hungary once again functions as a constitutional government established by the Hungarian people through free choice.
